effect_entries.effect:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer's PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.

flavor_text_entries.text:
感謝を　伝える　メールが
書きやすい　レターペーパー。
ポケモンに　持たせて　使う。

Stationery designed to make it easy
for you to express thanks. Have a
Pokémon hold it for delivery.

Carta da lettere ideale per scrivere dei
ringraziamenti.
Si può dare a un Pokémon affinché la consegni.

Los Pokémon pueden llevarla o usarla para
recuperarse de problemas de estado.

Briefpapier, mit dem man sich bei jemandem
bedanken kann. Gib es einem Pokémon zum
Tragen.

Un papier à lettres idéal pour les remerciements.
Peut être tenu et livré par un Pokémon.

감사의 마음을 전하는 메일을
쉽게 쓸 수 있는 편지지.
포켓몬에게 지니게 해서 쓴다.

かんしゃを　つたえる　メールが
かきやすい　びんせん。
ポケモンに　もたせて　つかう。

Stationery designed for
a thank-you note.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

Stationery designed for
a thank-you note.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

Un papier à lettres idéal pour les
remerciements. Peut être tenu
et livré par un Pokémon.
